capabilities.capability: This transformation allows IAP users to find the first available number from an array of already allocated integers given a starting integer and an ending integer

inputs.name: startRange
inputs.description: Lower bound (inclusive) for the range between which a number is allocated

inputs.name: endRange
inputs.description: Upper bound (exclusive) for the range between which a number is allocated

outputs.name: assigned
outputs.description: The first available number if found. Otherwise, it will be false

name: Allocate One Number - IAP
overview: Find the first available number from an array of already allocated integers given a starting integer and an ending integer
